document.full_text: a new york advertising agency apologized on monday to a local firefighter for creating an ad saying he had been at the world trade center on september 11, 2001, when in fact he was not.
document.title: ad agency apologizes over use of new york firefighter photo
lines_and_colors: a new york advertising agency apologized on monday to a local firefighter for creating an ad saying he had been at the world trade center on september 11, 2001, when in fact he was not.
